fgf.title: Content Data Management Specialist
fgf.description: FGF was the first company I interned for as part of my co-op program. I assisted the content data team in transitioning from the company's current ERP to SAP S/4 Hana. As a result, I had the opportunity to work with various technologies including Microsoft SharePoint, SQL, and Excel. I learned how to create SQL queries, and import that data into Excel. I also too the chance and learned to use Excel VBA to code my own macros for transforming the data.

qualcomm.title: Software Engineering Intern, AI - Machine Learning
qualcomm.description: Qualcomm gave me an incredible opportunity to work alongside a team of interns to create a developer tool from the ground up. The tool was completed in Python, and successfully analyzed two versions of a Caffe2 or Tensorflow neural network for differences in accuracy and output in each layer/op. Here I learned certain fundamentals concepts of industry software development, including source control, software architecture, and design patterns.

autodesk.title: Autodesk Research
autodesk.description: This was the first time I have ever been part of a research team! The team specializes in HCI and data-visualization. I helped in building an internal HR data-visualization research project with Typescript and D3.js. This was my first major brush with web-applications, and I learned how to be a front-end developer and build websites that are both aesthetic and efficient. I also had the opportunity to witness in-depth what industry research looks like!
